35#ifndef PPPCRYPT_H
36#define PPPCRYPT_H
37
38#ifdef HAVE_CRYPT_H
39#include <crypt.h>
40#endif
41
42#ifndef USE_CRYPT
43#include <des.h>
44#endif
45
46extern bool DesSetkey __P((u_char *));
47extern bool DesEncrypt __P((u_char *, u_char *));
48extern bool DesDecrypt __P((u_char *, u_char *));
49
50#endif /* PPPCRYPT_H */
